thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com | 4 of 99
thread.title: Jennifer

author: Jennifer
title: Jennifer
text: I received my order as promised. The instructions to assemble the mirror were easy to follow. The mirror I chose is very pretty. The mirror isn't installed. Mirrormates directions on how to measure were fine, however, as I had never ordered previously, I didn't think to check to see if the existing mirror had been installed flat to the wall originally. It had not. The bottom right corner stands away from the wall about 1/4" so the frame doesn't lay flat and there is a 1/4" gap. I haven't figured out how to remedy this yet so the mirror frame hasn't been set in place. I would definitely order again and have recommended to friends.
